title: The Road to Ruin (1934 film) Dorothy Davenport, Melville Shyer | Colorized Movie

sources.title: The Road to Ruin (1934 film) Dorothy Davenport, Melville Shyer | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
An innocent girl! A life destroyed!
Ann is corrupted by her fun-loving friend Eve, introducing her to the evils of romance novels.  Fueling their fun, with booze, wacky-tobaccy, and the horizontal tango. The girls date men as old as their fathers, but Ann ends up an addict, an alcoholic, and looking "undo" her pregnancy.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/awzIGomKcSY
 

Original title: The Road to Ruin  (1934)
This film has subtitles in many languages.

Directors: Dorothy Davenport, Melville Shyer
Writer: Norton S. Parker
Stars: Helen Foster, Nell O'Day, Glen Boles
Genres: Colorized, Classics, Drama, Post-Code, Propaganda film


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
00:59 Teenage girls navigate friendships, family dynamics, and romance in a lively evening gathering.
11:37 A glimpse into a social gathering with romantic tension, misunderstandings, and a late-night confession.
26:36 A glimpse into a social gathering with drama and romance unfolding among young adults.
46:32 Young girls involved in scandalous behavior receive help and guidance after a physical examination reveals troubling results.
52:26 Tragic events unfold as a family faces illness, secrets, and ultimately death.
